subject: RE: [junit] RecursiveTestSuite equivalent for JUnit 4?
msgSnippet: Thank you.  ClasspathSuite did exactly what I needed.  Also, it seems to work fine with JUnit 4.5. Cheers, Todd.
messageBody:
Thank you. ClasspathSuite did exactly what I needed. Also, it seems to
work fine with JUnit 4.5.


Cheers,
Todd.
